description:
Salomon's Shift Pro 100 AT combines the stability and power of a true alpine boot with the versatility of a touring boot fit for the whole mountain. The highly customizable Custom Shell HD and liner can be thermo-moulded to fit your foot perfectly. The GripWalk soles and Surelock mechanism provide traction and range of motion when in walk mode. Inbounds or out of bounds, the shift has never been easier.

  • Polyurethane shell with fibreglass framing transfers power efficiently to your ski
  • Coreframe and Sensifit™ inserts add power and easy step-in
  • Cuff is Polyolefin and polyamide for stability and ideal flex
  • Shell and seamless liner can be thermo-moulded for personalized performance
  • 4 aluminum micro-adjust buckles secure your foot in a snug fit
  • 35 mm strap adds extra support at the top of the cuff
  • Adjustable flex lets you tweak the boot's stiffness
  • Oversized pivot transfers power smoothly
  • GripWalk soles allow nearly-normal walking with a rockered design
  • Compatible with tech bindings, WTR bindings, GripWalk bindings and MNC bindings
name: Salomon Shift Pro 100 AT Ski Boots - Men's
